title: Ping
body: What about an option to check out your ping while you are in the League of Legends Lobby? It would certainly save the time of making a custom game and then quiting it just to check the ping. And even the people who play normal games to see if their ping is stable. I personally would love the option of a Lobby Ping Test.{{champion:81}}

replies.body:
You could simply use a website to discover your ping.
I use http://www.meter.net/ping-test/  personally.

i use arams as my ping test and warmup. Having high ping on aram isn't really as tilting and you can reasonably still be useful even on 1200 ping on aram and just bide your time till the misery ends.

 On aram players are from all skill levels, as well as a large population of bots, nobody will even notice your suffering.

but yeah a ping estimator somewhere in the client would help.
